name: InfluenceBasedDeFactoControllingParty
definition: party that holds influence-based control over some other party
label: influence-based de facto controlling party

name: DeFactoControllingInterestParty
label: de facto controlling interest party
definition: party that exercises some control over an entity other than via explicit, legal means

name: InvestmentBasedDeFactoControl
definition: control that arises through some investment in some entity, other than via the holding of constitutional equity (shares etc.) in that entity
label: investment-based de facto control

name: EntityControllingParty
label: entity controlling party
definition: party that has the authority to control some legal entity

name: InvestmentBasedDeFactoControllingInterestParty
label: investment-based de facto controlling interest party
definition: party that holds investment-based control over some other party

name: DeJureControllingInterestParty
definition: party that has the legal authority to exercise control
label: de jure controlling interest party

name: SoleControllingParty
definition: party that has sole control over and directs the affairs of some legal entity
label: sole controlling party

name: InfluenceBasedDeFactoControl
label: influence-based de facto control
definition: informal control that involves influence over some party

name: Receiver
label: receiver
definition: party appointed by some court for the purposes of winding up the affairs of some entity which is no longer solvent

name: CourtAppointedControl
label: court appointed control
definition: control conferred by the actions of some court, for example in the context of receivership

name: TotalOwner
label: total owner
definition: party that has 100 percent ownership some legal entity

name: ContractualControl
label: contractual control
definition: control established through the terms of some contract

name: ControlledParty
label: controlled party
definition: person or organization over which some party exercises some form of authority or influence with respect to some situation

name: ControllingAlliance
definition: group that has formed some alliance to jointly exercise control over some entity
label: controlling alliance

name: JointControllingParty
label: joint controlling party
definition: party that collectively has the authority to control the affairs of some business organization

name: MajorityControllingParty
definition: controlling party that possesses, either directly or indirectly, the power to direct or cause the direction of the management and policies of a legal person, whether through the ownership of a majority of voting securities, by contract, or otherwise
label: majority controlling party

name: hasControllingOrganizationMember
definition: relates a controlled party to a controlling member of the organization
label: has controlling organization member

name: isBasedOnInvestmentEquity
definition: indicates investment-based de facto control, which is is based on the holding of some investment equity by some party
label: is based on investment equity

name: hasMajorityControllingParty
definition: indicates a party that owns a controlling stake (over 50 percent) in the entity
label: has majority controlling party

name: isAdvisedBy
definition: indicates the party that acts in an advisory capacity to the controlled party
label: has advisor

name: advises
definition: provides counsel or guidance to
label: advises

name: isControllingMemberOf
label: is controlling member of
definition: identifies a controlled organization over which the member has some measure of control
